basic.Peptide Name: Human hepcidin-20 (Hepc20; one chain of Hepcidin; Human, mammals, animals)
basic.Target Organism: Gram-negative bacterium:Escherichia coli;Gram-positive bacteria:Staphylococcus aureus, S. epidermidis, group B Streptococcus.Fungi:Candida albicans, Aspergillus fumigatus, Aspergillus niger.
